title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Movement Quality
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Restore movement competency, tissue capacity, scapulo‑humeral rhythm; build aerobic base.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: Strength (full): Back Squat 4x6 @RPE6, RDL 3x8, Split Squat 3x8/leg
Upper: Landmine press 4x8, Bench Pull 4x10 (scap control)
Footwork circuit 3x (ladder 20'', cone T‑drill, shuffle 10m x4)

notes: Week 1: Z2 30–40' x2 + technique volume low. Week 2: +10% general volume; eccentrics 3–4s on key lifts.
